attributes.action: Get the UK & Ireland database shut down
attributes.additional_details: This site is so wrong on so may levels, one, most of there post have been or should have been taken off because of data protection.  All of the 'offenders' , ' criminals' have been punished and have fully accepted what they have done wrong and they want to get back to a normal life without the whole world knowing what they have done in the past.
attributes.background: Yes people have done bad and wrong things in the past, they have been punished for it, they deserve a second chance. People can change, nothings impossible the past is the past you don't need to put it into the present and future and ruin life because of one mistake they did.

rejection.details:
You can report concerns about data protection to the Information Commissioner's Office:

https://ico.org.uk/concerns/
